| Q             | A                        |
|---------------|--------------------------|
| Branch?       | ``master`` / ``develop`` |
| Bug fix?      | ``yes`` / ``no``         |
| New feature?  | ``yes`` / ``no``         |
| Deprecations? | ``yes`` / ``no``         |
| Tickets       | Fix ``#``                |
| License       | ``ISC``                  |

---
